title: The Club
description: *Warning: This book contains adult content and graphic scenes only appropriate for ages 18+.One year after leaving her cheating boyfriend, Laney Holden still canâ€™t seem to catch a break with men. After a year of blind dates that go nowhere, she grows jaded against the male race, even with the choice men at work. When her best friend comes up with a new plan for her love life, Laney follows along, just hoping to find something different. But what waits for her behind the door of room 237 is nothing like she ever expected. "The Club" is the first of three novellas in the Room 237 Series.
author: Emma  Payne
